subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick, who on Friday night had earned his first pole in Darlington, S.C., captured his first Southern 500 victory Saturday night, passing Dale Earnhardt Jr. two laps from the end of the longest race in the track’s 65-year Nascar history.
snippet: Kevin Harvick, who on Friday night had earned his first pole in Darlington, S.C., captured his first Southern 500 victory Saturday night, passing Dale Earnhardt Jr. two laps from the end of the longest race in the track’s 65-year Nascar history.
